roleset.name: make higher

example.name: causal arg 0
example.text: The move is sure to heighten concerns about increased Japanese investment in U.S. biotechnology firms.
example.arg: concerns about increased Japanese investment in U.S. biotechnology firms.

example.name: ergative
example.text: CenTrust Savings Bank said federal thrift regulators ordered it to suspend dividend payments on its two classes of preferred stock, indicating that regulators' concerns about the troubled institution have heightened.
example.arg: regulators' concerns about the troubled institution

example.name: nominal rel: heightening
example.text: Life is a struggle . The vitality of the country lies in the continuous heightening and fostering of the overall quality of all the people to constantly adapt to the development needs of the times .
example.arg: of the overall quality of all the people

roleset.note: HEIGHTEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'heighten' based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'heightening' based on BOLT-7. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. (from heighten.01-v)
HEIGHTENING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from heightening.01-n)

roleset.name: in the upper ranges (altitude, pitch, etc)

example.name: arg1
example.text: This manifests into the devastation we often see in neighborhoods , where-1 the poverty rate is high [*-1].

example.name: wide range of arg2s
example.text: Orchid Beach penthouse is high in altitude, price and glamour

example.name: argMs, lexicalized comparative alias
example.text: The reason specific ethnic groups are targeted for trying to reduce crime is because , for whatever reason , crime overall is often higher statistically in these groups .

roleset.note: HIGH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, corresponds somewhat to heighten-v.01. (from high.01-j)
HIGHER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from higher.01-j)

roleset.name: elated, in good spirits

example.name: That's a little harsh, but both args.
example.text: Still *PRO* Feeling high from that Toy Story 3 trailer? Well, get ready to be disapointed.

roleset.note: HIGH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from high.02-j)

roleset.name: stoned, intoxicated

example.name: both args
example.text: Man runs into Ross Campground Church, announces he's high on "bath salts"

roleset.note: HIGH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from high.03-j)
